item.title: Save with time stamp
item.description: Oftenly I have to deal with modifications of a scraping code, whose outcomes change or are subject to errors. Hence, I found useful to have a way to create versions of a data frame, this is a made savts. This simple yet useful function creates csv file with time stamp. It saves a data frame in the working directory as a csv file, separated by semicolon with a date and system time (format %d%m%y_%H%M).
